content: I agree that the story of elijah and elisha continues to resonate with people today. this is because the themes and lessons are timeless and can be applied to a variety of situations in our lives. the story reminds us of the importance of faith, perseverance, humility, and obedience, which are values that are still relevant and necessary today. it's inspiring to see how the experiences of elijah and elisha can continue to teach, inspire, and guide us in our own lives.
